heading: RBH0001
0: RESOLUTION OF BOTH HOUSES CONSTITUTING THE SENATE AND THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES INTO A CONSTITUENT ASSEMBLY TO PROPOSE REVISIONS OF THE 1987 CONSTITUTION BY ADOPTING A FEDERAL FORM OF GOVERNMENT AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
